name: The Domino Problem
description:
A Puzzle Game based on the Domino Effect (Literally) where you Take One Domino wherever you choose to meet Objectives.

This game was made for the Vaultacular Game Jam:

  • Limitation: Three Levels
  • Theme: "Here, Take One"

Special Thanks:

  • Anasta for composing the song Quiet Troubles for the game.
Controls:

(These are taught in the game, but if you want to know them beforehand...)

  • Left Click: To Navigate Menus and to Take One Domino.
  • Right Click: To Reset the level. (Will only work once you lose)
